item.title: Welcome
item.description:
Hello! My name is Ricky and I’m a software developer.

This site is more of a portfolio more than it is my blog.

We’re all very busy people so each post will be (technically) be a one-minute read - unless I post a tutorialðŸ¤”

This post also fits in a tweet!
